packageJSON.name: git-it-electron
packageJSON.description: An open source desktop app for learning Git and GitHub

scripts.build-all: npm run build-chals && npm run build-pages && npm run build-zhtw && npm run build-ja

releases.name: New Year New Release
releases.body: This has some small fixes but mostly a restructuring of files. Enjoy ✨ Also @reporobot has had some updates, too 🤖

releases.name: Updated Dependencies
releases.body: The previous version (4.1.1) was missing a dependency. This fixes that and updates to using `electron` over `electron-prebuilt`  🌮

releases.name: A little bit of newness
releases.body:
This version has some copy fixes ✏️ and fixes a bug with refreshing 🐛 the window. Not too much to see here. Enjoy!

🍍

This release is fun! It has improvements to the Forks and Branches challenges in hopes that they're clearer or you're able to at least debug easier. These two challenges trip people up the most. Git-it will also now remember your selected folder! And it's using the latest Electron 👾

This release fixes a bug in the packaging script that was regex'ing where it we don't want it to! 

Thanks #122 @martinheidegger 👏

releases.name: v4.0.0
releases.body:
Wow! The first non-beta release of Git-it for the desktop (built on [Electron](http://electron.atom.io)!

It's the same steps and [outcomes](http://jlord.us/patchwork) but now as a desktop app with everything wrapped into the same interface. See [release blog post](http://jlord.us/blog/git-it-electron.html) for more info if you'd like 💓 

Note: the Windows app is much larger because it [needs to include a copy of Git](https://github.com/jlord/git-it-electron/issues/5).

releases.name: More Beta
releases.body:
The last release, `3.0.0, had bad executables. That has been fixed here and I deleted the old one. 

Notes from `3.0.0` that also apply here: Includes :jp: Japanese translations.

releases.name: Still Beta
releases.body:
This is another Beta update. It includes mostly small UI fixes to unify how it looks on all systems. Probably some other stuff but I forgot—I'm sorry—enjoy!

**Note, I've just realized (much after this release) that I built these incorrectly and while these builds work, some include the other OS builds inside of them so the file size is much larger than it should be. Use a newer version than this if you can :sparkles:**

releases.name: Beta
releases.body: These are the first ever releases of Git-it, the desktop version, built on [Electron](electron.atom.io). These releases are beta, please open issues and help us make it better :sparkles:
